body:
I see.
I can't say that I fully understand that code, but it seems to me that we choose the strategy for every _reference_ to a symbol (loop over s->r). That is, one reference can have got type and another plt type, and so we will emit both.
I am not sure whether it is necessary to emit several GOT entries for a single symbol. Perhaps a single entry per symbol will do. But that's a different story.


+ @minux @rsc we are lost here
